scenario.name: MESSAGE redirect with 305 - three contacts
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 305 Use Proxy [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[pid]SIPpTag01[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:contact1@127.0.0.1:5062>;q=1.0 Contact: <sip:contact2@127.0.0.1:5063>;q=0.5 Contact: <sip:contact3@127.0.0.1:5064>;q=0.1 Content-Length: 0
